dcterms:description: A dataset collected in the CARLA simulator consisting of First-person view (FPV) and Birdâ€™s eye view (BEV) image sequences used for training a visual navigation system.

dcterms:description: A validation dataset obtained from Google Street View API, consisting of panoramic images segmented into different classes, used for evaluating the perception model.
dcterms:title: Google Street View Dataset

dcterms:description: A test dataset recorded using a mobile robot, consisting of video sequences labeled for evaluating the quality of representations estimated by the navigation system.
dcterms:title: Beobotv3 Test Dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of FPV-BEV image pairs used for training the perception model, although specific details are not provided.
dcterms:title: FPV-BEV Dataset
